module.title: Info: Relocation
module.description: Short-URL relocation to external internet resources.
module.log: Add shortcut route if router module is installed.
Support localization and add english locales.
Count views only for requests from outside.
Set new status "used" for relocations requested from outside.
module.author: Christian Würker
module.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>relocations`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>relocations` ( `relocationId` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `creatorId` int(11) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `status` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', `title` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `url` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `views` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `createdAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL, `usedAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`relocationId`), KEY `creatorId` (`creatorId`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `title` (`title`), KEY `url` (`url`), KEY `createdAt` (`createdAt`), KEY `usedAt` (`usedAt`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
